name: Kung-fu Mouse Vs The Trillion Cat Gang
name_original: Kung-fu Mouse Vs The Trillion Cat Gang
description:
You are a master of kung-fu and a mouse. Your cheese is in danger because of the damn Trillion Cat Gang. Defend your cheese!!!

Controls

  • "A" and "D" -> Move
  • Space bar -> Jump
  • Right and left mouse buttons -> Attack right and left
  • Any mouse button while jumping -> Vertical Attack
